body:
No, what I wrote is correct.  Try this on your branch:
```
torch.cat([torch.randn(1,4, requires_grad=True), torch.randn(2,3,requires_grad=True), torch.randn(2,3, requires_grad=True)], 0, 0.5).sum().backward()
```
